Flow.description: Agent workflow for transaction dispute from a case or chat transcript
Flow.label: Transaction Dispute (Case)

loops.name: Iterate_Over_Transactions_to_Get_the_Amount
loops.label: Iterate Over Transactions to Get the Amount

screens.name: At_Least_One_Transaction_Should_be_Selected
screens.label: At Least One Transaction Should be Selected

fields.name: Error_Message
fields.fieldText: Select at least one transaction.

value.stringValue: I have now initiated the transaction dispute process. This is a process that we take very seriously at Cumulus Bank. You will receive a letter from us within the next couple of days, it is important that you review this letter, sign it and return it to us. Otherwise the money may not be refunded. For your reference the dispute record is {!Confirmation_Text}
For the transaction below, please provide the reason why you don't believe you initiated or caused this transaction.

fields.name: csrNote3
fields.fieldText:
Note to Customer Service Associate:


For each of the transactions we need to understand why the customer is disputing the transaction.


  • Duplicate Transaction: Use this when the customer reports that it is a copy of an existing transaction.
  • Transaction Not Recognized: Use this when the customer doesn't recognize the transaction but believe it could be valid
  • Suspected Fraud: Use this one if the customer reports that they have no knowledge of initiating this transaction.
  • Other: Only use this one if the customer provides a reason that doesn't fit within any of the previous reason codes.

value.stringValue: Thank you for taking the time to report these possible fraudulent transactions. At Cumulus Bank we take bank security very important and somebody will be reviewing this to make sure it doesn't happen again. Let me quickly get this entered into the system.

fields.name: csrNote2
fields.fieldText:
Note to Customer Service Associate:


When customers call in about fraudulent transactions they are often concerned about the impact on their financial stability and/or their credit score.


It is important that you calmly walk them through this interaction so we can get the information recorded.


Avoid making any comments or statements about the validity of these claims as the Dispute Team will be reviewing it separately and discuss with the customer as needed.

value.stringValue: Let us start by reviewing the recent transactions on your account.

fields.name: CSRNote1
fields.fieldText:
Note to Customer Service Associate:


Please walk the customer through these one by one. Avoid asking them questions that are 'too guided' but let them evaluate and tell you whether the transaction is of their knowledge or not.

fields.name: ErrorMessage
fields.fieldText: An unexpected error occurred. Your Salesforce admin can help with that. {!$Flow.FaultMessage}

fields.name: ErrorMessage2
fields.fieldText: An unexpected error occurred. Your Salesforce admin can help with that. {!$Flow.FaultMessage}

fields.name: NoRecordsFound
fields.fieldText: The selected account has no transactions.

fields.name: dewds
fields.fieldText: Only designed to work from Chat and Case
